title: Cyrus Highsmith
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Cyrus Hihgsmith**

**Fonts Designed:**

1993  
 [Nobel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Nobel) - with [Tobias Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tobias%20Frere-Jones) and [Dyana Weissman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dyana%20Weissman)

1995  
 [Benton Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Benton%20Sans) - with [Tobias Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tobias%20Frere-Jones)

1997  
 [Bureau Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bureau%20Roman) - with [David Berlow](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/David%20Berlow)  
 [Miller](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Miller) - with [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Carter), [Tobias Frere-Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tobias%20Frere-Jones)  
 [Miller Headline](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Miller%20Headline) - with [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Carter)

1998  
 [Daley’s Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Daley%E2%80%99s%20Gothic)  
 [Loupot](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Loupot) - with [Laurie Rosenwald](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Laurie%20Rosenwald)

1999  
 [Dispatch](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Dispatch)

2000  
 [Eggwhite](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eggwhite)  
 [Occupant Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Occupant%20Gothic)

2002  
 [Relay](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Relay)  
 [Stainless](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Stainless)

2003  
 [Prensa](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Prensa)

2004  
 [Amira](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Amira)

2007  
Novia  
Antenna

 [AIGA: Rebel without a Caslon: An Interview with Cyrus Highsmith](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809010817/http:/www.aiga.org/content.cfm/rebel-without-a-caslon)
author: filip blazek
